member.name: T:Gates.Gates
member.summary: Discussion of Processes 1. Gatekeeper must key in truck plate number 2. Check if this truck plate number has existing RGS or ACT visit 3. If yes, fill up truck information, driver information, truck visit and linked containers. 4. If not, fill up linked trucking company, create visit. 5. If visit is successfully created, allow gatekeeper to add container (receiving, delivery) 6. Gatekeeper must input CCR# for receiving, Gatepass# for import delivery. 7. Execute gate-in, print TID. 8. Gates monitoring shall track truck-containers for equipment control 9. At gate-out, gatekeeper must ensure that gatepass is still valid. 10. Execute gate-out, print EIR.
